titles.title: Military OneSource Transparency Act
Military OneSource Transparency Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to report on the Military OneSource program of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Military OneSource Transparency Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to annually report through FY2029 on its Military OneSource program. The program provides information and various support services to servicemembers and their families (e.g., counseling or tax preparation).
